descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description:[/b][/u]

Simple mod that removes the restriction of having to re-acquire the powers again from the All-Maker Stones, after they have been cast. This mod makes them all a 'normal power' that can be used once per day after being initially obtained.

* I have also added some additional changes.

- Summon Karstaag. You can Summon him as a daily power, I have removed the (3) summon limit.
- Dremora Merchant now has (20,000) gold and will buy stolen items.
- North Wind Power and Sun Flare no longer damage you or your allies.


[u][b]Powers Include:[/b][/u]

Beast Stone - Summons a werebear for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Earth Stone - The caster ignores 80% of all physical damage for 30 seconds.
Sun Stone - Casts a 100 point fiery explosion centered on the caster.
Tree Stone - Spells cost 75% less magicka for 60 seconds.
Water Stone - Heals everyone close to the caster for 200 points.
Wind Stone - Targets take 20 points of frost damage for 10 seconds, plus stamina damage.

Summon Karstaag - Summons Karstaag to fight for you for 120 seconds.
Summon Dremora Merchant - Summons a Dremora merchant to buy/sell all your goods.


[u][b]Change Log: [/b][/u]

[b]1.6 (Final Update)

- Made compatible with Unofficial Dragonborn [/b]Patch
- Fixes to AOE Powers (Nerfed them by accident) and increased Wind Stone damage by a small amount.
- Added no spell absorb/reflect for Summon Karstaag power.
- Cleaned with TES5 Edit.


[u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u]

*Dragonborn DLC


[u][b]Installation: [/b][/u]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding All-MakerStones.esp to Skyrim/Data folder.

[u][b]Uninstall:[/b][/u]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove All-MakerStones.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.
